title: A Level Sociology - Documents
description: Richard looks at documents for your A Level Sociology exam. In this episode, he will look at the advantages and disadvantages of using documents in studying events. Ideal for preparing for your A Level Sociology exam. For more info visit www.senecalearning.com
dc:creator: Seneca Learning Revision
